name: GNOMAD
description:
I didn't have as much time to work on this as I originally expected. It's pretty much just a demo for the mech controller. I didn't even get to the animations. 

On the plus side, I learned a TON about 3D modeling and making 3D games in general, so I'd call that a win.

The web version doesn't look as good so if you want prettier graphics go download the windows/linux/mac version.

CONTROLS:

  • Move Legs - WASD
  • Rotate Legs - Q /E
  • Rotate Head - Mouse
  • Rotate Camera Only - Hold Shift and move Mouse
  • Camera Zoom - Mouse wheel
  • Toggle Laser Sight - Z
  • Laser - Hold Left Click
  • Rocket - Hold Right Click
